text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump Too Little Too Late Donny boy I ask my congressman and Senators to investigation the reason for delays in responding to Novel Coronavirus! Also why you stop funding to state testing activities! Until you provide answers I suggest freeze funding of your vacancies!
